summary: THE CAR ROLLS WHEN IN GEAR. FRONT OR BACK, DEPENDING ON THE PITCH OF THE ROAD. AT A STOP LIGHT, IF I TOOK MY FOOT OFF MY BRAKE, IT ROLES BACK.  WHEN PUTTING THE CAR IN THE GARAGE, I STOPPED HALF WAY IN THE  CAR ROLL OUT INTO THE ALLY.  THE OTHER 35 COMPLAINTS DIDN'T HAVE THIS PROBLEM, SO MAYBE ITS NOT A COMMON PROBLEM.  THERE IS ONLY 20,000 MILES ON IT.  *JB
